message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. Would you consider selling it to me for $10,000?
I appreciate your offer, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is below its true value. Could you meet me halfway at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet you at $11,000. Could you consider $9,500 as a fair offer?
